pullRequest.title: Extract jsonToMessages function so this can be used as a library
pullRequest.bodyText:
Summary
Make it possible to use this as a library.
Details

 Extract a new jsonToMessages function
 Create src/index.ts that exposes that function
 Rename "platform" to "implementation"
 Rename "javascript" to "cucumber-js"
 Rename "ruby" to "cucumber-ruby"

Motivation and Context
When this is available we can write a webapp using the function. That way this can be deployed as a microservice somewhere, making it easier to consume.

commit.message: Extract jsonToMessages function so this can be used as a library

nodes.bodyText: Platform typically means Windows/Unix/OSx. Would implementation be a better word?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,15 +8,16 @@ import { traverseFeature as traverseBehaveFeature } from './behave/JSONTraverse'
 import IPredictableSupportCode from './IPredictableSupportCode'
 import IAstMaker from './IAstMaker'
 import { IdGenerator, messages } from '@cucumber/messages'
+import { Platform } from './types'
 
 export default function traverseFeature(
-  sourceLang: string,
+  platform: Platform,

nodes.bodyText:
I could use the java impl to generate messages that would be classed as JavaScript.
Perhaps gherkin and behave would be better.

commit.message: Add index file to expose jsonToMessages
